import { BrowserRouter as Router, Route, Link } from 'react-router-dom' import React, { Component } from 'react'; import { Grid, Card } from 'semantic-ui-react' import AthleteCard from '../CoachComponents.js/AthleteCard'; class CoachHompage extends Component { state = { athletes: [], athleteBeingProgrammedFor: undefined } handleAthlete = athleteID => { const athlete = this.state.athletes.find(athlete => (athlete.id === athleteID)) this.setState({athleteBeingProgrammedFor: athlete}) console.log(athlete) } componentDidMount() { fetch('http://localhost:3000/coach/athletes',{ method: "GET", headers: { Authorisation: localStorage.token, } }) .then(resp => resp.json()) .then(athletes => this.setState({athletes})) } render() { return ( <>



Welcome Back {this.props.user.first_name}!
